trans-unit.source: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to call a method on a local service.
trans-unit.target: Define uma atividade de comunicação do fluxo de trabalho que é usada para chamar um método em um serviço local.

trans-unit.source: This activity is used to send data from the workflow to the host through the local service.
trans-unit.target: Esta atividade é usada para enviar dados de fluxo de trabalho para o host por meio do serviço local.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) and is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um serviço local é uma classe que implementa uma interface de serviço local (uma interface marcada com <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) e é adicionado a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the external method is called all parameters of the method are cloned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando o método externo é chamado todos os parâmetros do método são clonados.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter types implement <xref:System.ICloneable> the `Clone` method is called or they are serialized and deserialized with a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.
trans-unit.target: Se os tipos de parâmetro implementam <xref:System.ICloneable>o `Clone` método é chamado ou se eles são serializados e desserializados com <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> </xref:System.ICloneable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref> classe usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity, used to initialize the activity name property.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo usuário da atividade, usado para inicializar a propriedade de nome de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> for the external method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"> </xref> para o método externo.

trans-unit.source: This property defines which specific <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> activity a given external method call comes from.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade define qual específico <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>atividade proveniente de uma chamada de método externo fornecido.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>

trans-unit.source: This value can then be used in the payload of a local communication service event to direct that event to the correct <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor, em seguida, pode ser usado na carga do evento de comunicação local do serviço para direcionar o evento para o correto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crexample](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crexample](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]correlação, consulte o [correlacionado exemplo de serviço Local](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).

trans-unit.source: The correlation token for the external method.
trans-unit.target: O token de correlação para o método externo.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Tries to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tenta executar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that contains the execution environment in which to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> que contém o ambiente de execução no qual executar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: executionContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: executionContexté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The service object for the executionContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O objeto de serviço para o executionContext é uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: Executa a inicialização nas propriedades de dependência.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A> property, verifies the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> properties are set and verifies that the event referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property can be found in the interface referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse método inicializa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A>propriedade, verifica o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>propriedades são definidas e verifica se o evento citados no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>pode ser encontrada na interface referenciada no <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an external method's declaring interface that has the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um método externo da declaração de interface que tem o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The external method's declaring interface that has the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O método externo da declaração de interface que tem o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property corresponds to the name of the interface that was marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>propriedade corresponde ao nome da interface que foi marcado com o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before invoking the method.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de chamar o método.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> event defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity invokes the external method on the local service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking>evento define um delegado de evento que é executado antes que a atividade invoca o método externo no serviço local.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to be called on the local service registered with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do método a ser chamado no serviço local registrado com o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The method name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: O nome do método do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property corresponds to the name of a method contained on an interface that is marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>propriedade corresponde ao nome de um método contido em uma interface que é marcada com o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Provides a hook for derived classes to extract out and return values from the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um gancho para classes derivadas extrair e retornar valores de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called just after the external method is run.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado logo após o método externo é executado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"> </xref> evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Provides a hook for derived classes to set <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um gancho para classes derivadas definir <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called just before the external method is run.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado antes do método externo é executado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"> </xref> evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the external method's formal parameter list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de parâmetros associáveis encontrados na lista de parâmetros formais do método externo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref> of parameters to bind to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"> </xref> de parâmetros para associar a.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> que tem como destino o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo de acesso para a propriedade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
trans-unit.target: Usado em tempo de compilação para validar se as propriedades associadas corretamente um ao outro.

trans-unit.source: Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: Sem essa interface essas informações são inferidas diretamente do getter/setters de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>para fornecer acesso aos serviços de tempo de design se forem necessários.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"> </xref> valor de enumeração que indica o nível de acesso da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref:System.Type>da propriedade especificada.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: Usado em tempo de compilação para validar se as propriedades corretamente estão associadas a um do outro.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>para fornecer acesso aos serviços de tempo de design se forem necessários.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
trans-unit.target: O para a propriedade cujo nome é passado como o propertyName parâmetro.
